original_text: “Yesterday, I saw the blood of Naboth and his sons where you murdered them. One day, I will punish you as you deserve. I will do it here on this piece of land. That is what the Lord says.” So now pick up Joram's body and throw it on this piece of land. Do what the Lord has promised he would do.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시기를 내가 어제 나봇의 피와 그의 아들들의 피를 분명히 보았노라 여호와께서 또 말씀하시기를 이 토지에서 네게 갚으리라 하셨으니 그런즉 여호와의 말씀대로 그의 시체를 가져다가 이 밭에 던질지니라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Yesterday, I saw the blood of Naboth and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 어제, 나는 나밧과 그의 아들들의 피를 보았다

sentences.original_text: One day, I will punish you
I will do it here on this piece of land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 땅에서 그렇게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
So now pick up Joram's body
and throw it on this piece of land
Do what the Lord has promised he would do
